ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description: These classes support cofiguration file defsults for running the Omicron control programs and result plotter, not the trigger generatr. It also has classes for analyzing gaps and intervals for processing.
about.summary: Collection of common classes and function supporting LIGO Omicron pipelines

about.description: These classes support cofiguration file defsults for running the Omicron control programs and result plotter, not the trigger generatr. It also has classes for analyzing gaps and intervals for processing.
about.summary: Collection of common classes and function supporting LIGO Omicron pipelines

name: omicron_utils
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "omicron_utils" %}
{% set version = "0.0.13" %}
{% set python_min = "3.10" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/omicron_utils-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5ae515825f410ef5bb8816b71019b92e84f1a902c9a514c2aac09b7822e09488

build:
  entry_points:
    - omicron-config-utils = omicron_utils.config_utils:main
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools >=60
    - setuptools-scm >=3.4
    - wheel
    - pip
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }},<3.12

test:
  imports:
    - omicron_utils
  commands:
    - pip check
    - omicron-config-utils --help
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://detchar.docs.ligo.org/omicron-gap/
  dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/joseph-areeda/omicron_utils
  summary: Collection of common classes and function supporting LIGO Omicron pipelines
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  license_file: LICENSE
  description:
    These classes support cofiguration file defsults for running the
    Omicron control programs and result plotter, not the trigger
    generatr. It also has classes for analyzing gaps and intervals
    for processing.


extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - areeda
